Select Location Dialog

Use this dialog box to select a workfile location, select a configuration file location, or to select an access control database location.

If you want to...

Select a workfile location for a project database, project, or versioned file... Select the location to which workfiles will be checked out and from which workfiles will be checked in to Version Manager, and click OK.
Select the location of a configuration file... Select the location of an existing configuration file to use and click OK.
Select the location of an access control database... Select the location of an existing access control database file to use and click OK.
